mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, EMAIL, NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, PASSWORD, ZIPCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, OAUTH_ID, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, PROFILE_URL, CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{passwordHash}, #{zipcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{profileImage}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID as memberID, EMAIL, NICKNAME as nickname, MEMBER_NAME as name; PASSWORD as passwordHash, ZIPCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, GENDER, BIRTHDAY as birthday, PHONE_NUMBER as phone, PROFILE_URL as profileImage FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
